attributes.action: Need Charlie Says style public information films to educate the next generation
attributes.additional_details: It strikes me that we are missing a simple opportunity to galvanise some important concepts in the minds of children that carry through into adulthood. We should make it part of a broadcasters license that they have to support this, including all popular social media outlets.
attributes.background: Need Charlie Says style public information films to educate the next generation as to things like knife crime, drugs, and environmental issues. Growing up in the 70’s we were regularly shown Charlie Says informational films around things like stranger danger, safety near water etc. Why no more???

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
